snippet: The Advertising Club of New York is putting $700,000 into programs intended to attract minorities to the business and support their advancement.
abstract: Tanzina Vega Advertising column notes that the Advertising Club of New York is putting $700,000 into programs intended to attract minorities to the business and support their advancement.
lead_paragraph: The Advertising Club of New York is putting $700,000 into programs intended to attract minorities to the business and support their advancement.
